title: Report Minor Safety Incident
description: A miner reports a minor incident (a slip, trip, or fall with no injury) using a mobile app to ensure it is logged and investigated.

tasks.description: Open the safety reporting app and select 'Report Incident'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The incident reporting form is opened on the mobile device.

tasks.description: Fill out the form with the location, time, and a description of what happened (e.g., 'slipped on a small patch of oil near the workshop').
tasks.expected_outcome: The details of the incident are captured accurately.

tasks.description: Submit the report, which automatically notifies the area supervisor and the HSE department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The incident is logged in the safety system, and notifications are sent to the relevant people for follow-up.
